mapper.insert: INSERT INTO erp_goods (barcode, name, pinyin, shop_id, latest_buy_price, original_price, sale_price, member_price, discount, score_ratio, category_id, brand_id, unit_id, stock_quantity, create_time, status, remark) VALUES (#{barcode}, #{name}, #{pinyin}, #{shopId}, #{latestBuyPrice}, #{originalPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{memberPrice}, #{discount}, #{scoreRatio}, #{category.id}, #{brand.id}, #{unit.id}, #{stockQuantity}, #{createTime}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM erp_goods WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND `name` = #{name}
SELECT id FROM erp_goods WHERE shop_id = #{shopId} AND `barcode` = #{barcode}
mapper.sql: SELECT t.id, t.barcode, t.name, t.pinyin, t.shop_id, t.latest_buy_price, t.original_price, t.sale_price, t.member_price, t.discount, t.score_ratio, t.stock_quantity, t.status, t.create_time, t.remark, t.category_id, c.name AS category_name, t.brand_id, g.name AS brand_name, t.unit_id, u.name AS unit_name FROM erp_goods t LEFT JOIN erp_goods_category c ON c.id = t.category_id LEFT JOIN erp_goods_brand g ON g.id = t.brand_id LEFT JOIN erp_goods_unit u ON u.id = t.unit_id
